attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The actions of the police in arresting Damian Green and the subsequent seizure of his correspondence create a threat to Parliamentary Privilege and our wider liberties.  The similarity between this action and those that led to the English 
Civil War are clear.  Urgent action is required to prevent further erosion of our hard fought for freedoms.
Our elected representatives need to be free to hold all to account, and require privileges to carry this out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
